name: Yiu-Kai Ng
content: Yiu-Kai Dennis Ng 3322 TMCB Department of Computer Science Brigham Young University Yiu-Kai Dennis Ng is an associate professor of Computer Science Department at Brigham Young University. He received the B.S. and M.S. degrees in Computer Science at BYU in 1982 and 1984, respectively, and the Ph.D. degree in Computer Science at Kansas State University in 1991. He has been with the Computer Science Department at BYU since 1991. His current research interests are in web information retrieval, recommendation systems, and query processing. He is currently the director of the Advanced Information Retrieval Applications (AIRA) Lab at BYU. Dennis Ng is a member of ACM and IEEE.
